mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select rownum rn, a.* from ( select distinct p.* , CASE WHEN r.id = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS adminReplyChk from pconsult p ,(SELECT * FROM replys WHERE id = 'admin') r where p.pnum = r.pnum (+) order by p.pnum desc) a ) WHERE rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update pconsult set ptitle=#{ptitle}, pcontent=#{pcontent} where pnum=#{pnum}
update pconsult set pcount=pcount+1 where pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.insert: insert into pconsult values(pconsult_seq.nextval,#{id},#{ptitle},sysdate,0,#{pcontent},#{pw}) SELECT pconsult_seq.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select count(a.adminReplyChk) from ( select distinct p.* , CASE WHEN r.id = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS adminReplyChk from pconsult p ,(SELECT * FROM replys WHERE id = 'admin') r where p.pnum = r.pnum (+) order by p.pnum desc) a where a.adminReplyChk = 1 )
